mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ(FAQ_NUM, FAQ_CATEGORY, FAQ_TITLE, FAQ_CONTENT) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM FAQ), #{faqCategory},#{faqTitle},#{faqContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_CATEGORY=#{faqCategory}, FAQ_TITLE=#{faqTitle}, FAQ_CONTENT=#{faqContent} WHERE FAQ_NUM=#{faqNum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FAQ ORDER BY FAQ_NUM DESC;
